TopicTitle: How i can fix these graphic bugs?

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I have some problems with the graphic. Many important things like rocket stages, fuel display, Flight Results and other things are not really displayed. I'm playing on my ASUS Laptop with 6GB RAM and 4 x 2,4GHz CPU and on Ubuntu GNOME 16.04. I'm have KSP from Steam and it has no addons, mods, texture packs or other things.

 

I'm found not a button to post pictures and thats why i writed fast a small HTML website and putted the pictures on my own server here:

http://217.172.189.11/ksp/ksp.html

You can insert images by clicking the "insert other media" button on the bottom right as you post, you then get an option to "Insert image from URL", paste the URL from your hosting site and you will have images in your post.

like this
Thanks i will do it in my next post John FX but i don't know how i can gix my problem with the graphics :/
You could try adding the -force-glcore command line option.  It may work better or worse than the default, good luck...
